DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood laboratory may help doctor learn cancer . It may also help doctor predict well patient respond treatment . PURPOSE : This research study look protein blood sample predict treatment benefit patient recurrent and/or metastatic squamous cell head neck cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Blood Proteins Predicting Treatment Benefit Patients With Recurrent and/or Metastatic Head Neck Squamous Cell Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify head neck squamous cell cancer patient benefit treatment EGFR inhibitor ( i.e. , erlotinib hydrochloride , gefitinib , cetuximab ) VEGF inhibitor ( i.e. , bevacizumab ) , base predictive proteomic profile patient blood sample . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Blood sample analyze proteomic profile determine good bad prognosis patient treat without EGFR inhibitor and/or VEGF inhibitor .
